title: Transports Eye First Bearish Message In 10 Years
text:
Weekly Dow Jones Transportation Index

Transports have been flying high for nearly a decade. Is this trend about to end?

This chart looks at the index over the past 14 years. Since the summer of 2009, they have been creating a series of higher highs along line (2).

Over the past year, they have created a series of lower highs, just below line (1). These two lines are forming a narrowing pennant pattern that has to end.

The recent weakness has Transports testing 10-year rising support at (3) this week.

Until broken, this is a strong support line for this key sector.

If the support line breaks at (3), Transports will send a concerning message to the broad markets.

Keep a close eye on what this important sector does in the next few weeks.
description: Stocks Analysis by Chris Kimble covering: Dow Jones Transportation. Read Chris Kimble's latest article on Investing.com
